deleteModal.text: Are you sure you want to delete the following element?

addModal.text: Are you sure you want to add the following element?

nameSite.title: Site Name
nameSite.info: Here you enter the name of your site, which will be visible to all visitors to the site
nameSite.placeholder: Enter the name for your site

logo.title: Logo
logo.info: Here you have to insert the logo of your site which will also be visible to visitors

palettes.title: Select palette
palettes.info: Here you enter the colors of your site visible to customers, be careful to put a good contrast between the background and the text

banner.title: Featured banner
banner.info: Here the banner in evidence of the call to action must be customized, the colors are taken from the palette that can be found at the top of the page

workSection.title: Section of contacts for work
workSection.info: Here you enter the contacts that will be shown to all visitors to the site at the bottom of the page that should be used for business purposes

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.info: These will be the contacts and information about you / your company. They will be shown in the footer (bottom of page) of each screen of the site available to visitors

Hero.title: Hero
Hero.info: Hero of the page with an image, a title, a text

Title.title: Title
Title.info: Title of the section with the contents

Content.title: Content
Content.info: Text and media that make up the page content

social.title: Social
social.info: Enter the social networks that will be visible on the platform

socialSection.title: Social
socialSection.info: Enter the name of the social network

linkSection.title: Link
linkSection.info: Insert the link to the social network

articles.title: Blog Archive
articles.info: table where all the published articles are displayed, in the case of the single blogger he will see only his articles, the admin will see all the articles

titleSection.title: Title
titleSection.info: Insert the title of the article

coverSection.title: Cover
coverSection.info: Insert a cover photo for the event

categoriesSection.title: Categories
categoriesSection.info: Specify the categories to be assigned to the article

editorBlog.categoriesError: Tou have to select one category

volunteers.title: Volunteers
volunteers.info: Users registered on the site, click on the edit button to manually update the user's data or click on the delete button to delete the user from the system

editorVolunteers.title: User data
editorVolunteers.info: Click on the Save changes button to complete the update operation or click on the Delete user button to delete the user's data from the system

personalArea.title: Your data
personalArea.info: Data of the logged in user, click on the Save changes button to complete the update operation
personalArea.modalText: Changes successful, you will be redirected to the login page

Hero.title: Hero
Hero.info: Here will be inserted the image of the hero, the title and the text of the home

Results.title: Results
Results.info: The results of the non-profit organization will be entered here

Story.title: Story
Story.info: Here will be inserted a preview of the history of the non-profit organization

Hero.title: Hero
Hero.info: Here will be inserted the image of the hero, the title and the text of About

Content.title: Content
Content.info: Text and media that make up the page content

info.title: Info
info.info: Info section of the FAQ page, click on the Save changes button to accept the page changes

table.title: Faq
table.info: Questions in the FAQ section of the page, click on the + Add button to add a new question and answer, click on the edit or cancel buttons to change the data structure
table.question: QUESTION

FaqEditor.title: Faq
FaqEditor.info: Add a new question and answer, click the Save changes button to complete the operation or click the Cancel changes button to cancel the operation
FaqEditor.question: Frequently Asked Question

NewEvents.title: Scheduled Events
NewEvents.info: Table where the next scheduled events are displayed

OldEvents.title: Events Archive
OldEvents.info: Table where the archive of all past events is displayed

Title.title: Title
Title.info: Enter the title of the event

cover.title: Cover
cover.info: Insert a cover photo for the event

Date.title: Date and time
Date.info: Insert the date and time of the event

Place.title: Place
Place.info: Enter the place where the event will take place

Description.title: Description
Description.info: Insert an explanatory description of the event

Requirements.title: Requirements
Requirements.info: Specify the requirements to participate in the event

Categories.title: Categories
Categories.info: Table where the categories associated with an article are displayed

Collaborators.title: Collaborators
Collaborators.info: Registered collaborators, click on the edit button to manually update the user's data or click on the delete button to deactivate the user
Collaborators.infoDeactive: Deactivated users, click on the edit button to reactivate the user
Collaborators.activeModalText: Are you sure you want to reactivate the following user?

Volunteers.title: Volunteers
Volunteers.info: Registered users, click on the edit button to manually update the user's data or click on the delete button to deactivate the user

CollaboratorsEditor.title: User data
CollaboratorsEditor.info: Click on the Save changes button to complete the update operation or click on the Cancel changes button to cancel the operation

Donation.title: Donation
Donation.info: Title of the page with the donation table
